item.title: Xbox2Discord: How to Forward Audio from Xbox Live to Discord
item.description: If you game on PC, you probably have Discord installed to chat with your friends as you game. Discord has relatively decent audio, and it far surpasses the in-game chat capabilities built into most games. When gaming cross-platform, however, you’re stuck either using in-game chat or the tedious Xbox Companion app with limited controls and annoying party configs. This post will show you how to configure a setup to forward audio from an Xbox party directly to Discord, and visa versa.
